attributes.action: The British Public want to SACK Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details: Remove Boris Johnson from Government. He has lost the trust of the people. He is not to be trusted with the amount of scandals that surround him.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson can no longer be trusted to obey the rules he created for the United Kingdom and should be SACKED for the continuous lying in the House of Commons.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
